meanings.definition: A number equal to a thousand million (1,000,000,000)
meanings.sent1: The company made a profit of a billon dollars last year.
meanings.sent2: The population of the city reached over a billon people.
meanings.sent3: I have a billon things to do today, but I'll start with a nap.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like a billon bells ringing.
meanings.sent5: The starry sky seemed to hold a billon secrets within its depths.
